plot outline: The film revolves around a college student, named Kaushik. The perception of love by today's youth is revealed through his life span of five years from schooling to graduation. The story unfolds through the protagonist and the four girls he comes across in his life during that period.
title: Iruvar Ondranal
plot: The film revolves around a college student, named Kaushik. The perception of love by today's youth is revealed through his life span of five years from schooling to graduation. The story unfolds through the protagonist and the four girls he comes across in his life during that period.
